cause.description:
Our Safe Families program provides online safety resources to protect at-risk children from pornography and other dangers on the Internet. The Safe Families program is the only sizeable online safety program that is targeting families from low-income, Black communities and Latino communities. We were able to distribute 74,055 free copies of our online safety software this past year.
1. Keeping Children Safe Online.
2. Educating and empowering parents to keep their children safe.
3. Distributing resources to pastors, parents, nonprofits and other individuals to make the internet safe.
cause.name: Protecting Children Online
